snippet.title: Dead Room - Trailer
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer for my game Dead Room.

Dead Room is an indie game being made by just one person with the Unity game engine. The game is a wave based survival game with roguelike mechanics. It has a cutesy-horror aesthetic and takes inspiration from many horror movies/games/literature. The demo is available for free here, https://linechill.itch.io/dead-room

Consider supporting development patreon.com/DeadRoomGame
